_header: This blessed book that here beginneth
_description: Prologue to Rolle’s Commentary on the Psalter (in one MS only) — 120 lines

BodLauMis286.First Lines:
This blessyd boke that here begynneth full of louyng and melodyeOf
                    prayours be the which we wynneth þe grace of god all
                    myȝtye…
BodLauMis286.Last Lines:
…Hafe mercy on vs with myldnes and hampole help þerto in
                    hygthTo clywe and kunyng & clennes to buske vs to þe blysse ful
                    brigth
BodLauMis286.Editions:
Bramley,  Henry Ramsden. 
             The Psalter, or Psalms of David and certain canticles.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1884: 1-2.
Allen,  Hope Emily. 
             Writings Attributed to Richard Rolle.
         New York: Modern Language Association of America, 1927: 174 (extracts).
